name: boss-health
author: x
description: Boss health display for boss battle/juggernaut minigames.

boss-team-names.description: The name of the team that is considered a boss. Works throughout gamemodes.

interval.description: How often to check minigames and health and potentially display in chat, in milliseconds.

health-bar-size.description: How many characters the health bar should be composed of.

middle-print.description: Whether or not to use middle print instead of chat.

announce-timeout.description: How long to wait, in seconds, before showing the next health announcement.

announce-health-change.description: How much fractional health must be depleted before the announcement is shown.

announce-require-time-and-health-change.description: When true, the announcement will only occur when the time from last announcement passed announce-timeout AND the health changed by over announce-health-change. When off, either criteria will cause the display.
